fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Pair 2 players, seeing if they are from the same faction.
- Once per game, pear a player, giving them Basic defense.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__ - If part of the DSF, you have unlimited uses of your pear ability, which now grants Powerful defense.

*This may be the start of a new faction 👀*
